div.div:
Iteration 3 has receipt ofÂ channel_readyÂ as states and splits out the channel_reestablish into different states.Â This is likely not necessary since we should trigger a ready/connected event before we receive a peer message.
We still keep connected and disconnected as split graphs to highlight that there are different actions necessary.
Note: numbering of transitions has not been corrected as of 2/21/23.

switch.text: Iteration 3 has receipt ofÂ channel_readyÂ as states and spl...
